const pandora::PfoList *&  pPfoList 
) [static]

Get the current pfo list.

Parameters:

const std::string &  pfoListName,

pandora::StatusCode PandoraApi::GetReclusterMonitoringResults ( const pandora::Pandora &  pandora,
const void *  pTrackParentAddress,
float &  netEnergyChange,
float &  sumModulusEnergyChanges,
float &  sumSquaredEnergyChanges 
) [static]

Get the recluster monitoring results, recording the changes in the energy associated with a specific track during the pandora reclustering phase.

Parameters:
pandora the pandora instance to query
pTrackParentAddress address of track in the user framework
netEnergyChange to receive the net change in energy associated with the track during reclustering
sumModulusEnergyChanges to receive the sum of the moduli of energy changes during reclustering
sumSquaredEnergyChanges to receive the sum of the squared energy changes during reclustering

) [static]

Read pandora settings.

Parameters:
pandora the pandora instance to run the algorithms initialize

const std::string &  algorithmType,
pandora::AlgorithmFactory *const   pAlgorithmFactory 
) [static]

Register an algorithm factory with pandora.

Parameters:

Parameters:

const std::string &  xmlTagName,
pandora::SettingsFunction *  pSettingsFunction 
) [static]

Register a pandora settings function to e.g.

read settings for a registered particle id or energy correction function

Parameters:
pandora the pandora instance with which to register the pandora settings function
xmlTagName the name of the xml tag (within the <pandora></pandora> tags) containing the settings
pSettingsFunction pointer to the pandora settings function

pandora::StatusCode PandoraApi::SetCaloHitToMCParticleRelationship ( const pandora::Pandora &  pandora,
const void *  pCaloHitParentAddress,
const void *  pMCParticleParentAddress,
const float  mcParticleWeight = 1 
) [static]

Set calo hit to mc particle relationship.

Parameters:
pandora the pandora instance to register the relationship with
pCaloHitParentAddress address of calo hit in the user framework
pMCParticleParentAddress address of mc particle in the user framework
mcParticleWeight weighting to assign to the mc particle
